variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: MFO1
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit by telephone or in clinic, have you been admitted to a hospital?

variable.name: MFO2
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit by telephone or in clinic, have you been told by a physician that you have any heart disease that had not been diagnosed previously?

variable.name: MFO3A
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Heart attack

variable.name: MFO3C
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Congestive heart disease

variable.name: MFO3D
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Valvular heart disease

variable.name: MFO3E
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Arrhythmias or irregular heart beat

variable.name: MFO3F
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Stable angina or angina due to exertion

variable.name: MFO3G
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Unstable angina, or angina at rest

variable.name: MFO3H
variable.description: What did he or she say it was? Other heart disease

variable.name: MFO3I1
variable.description: Specify other heart disease line 1

variable.name: MFO3I2
variable.description: Specify other heart disease line 2

variable.name: MFO3I3
variable.description: Specify other heart disease line 3

variable.name: MFO4
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic , have you had any of the following surgeries or procedures? Coronary (or heart) bypass surgery?

variable.name: MFO6A
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, have you had any of the following surgeries or procedures? Coronary (or heart) angioplasty and/or stent

variable.name: MFO8
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, have you had any of the following surgeries or procedures? Endarterectomy, that is, an operation on a carotid artery in your neck?

variable.name: MFO10
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, have you had any of the following surgeries or procedures? Heart valve surgery

variable.name: MFO11
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, have you had any of the following surgeries or procedures? Pacemaker implant

variable.name: MFO12A
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Hypertension

variable.name: MFO12B
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Cancer

variable.name: MFO12C1
variable.description: Specify cancer (line 1)

variable.name: MFO12C2
variable.description: Specify cancer (line 2)

variable.name: MFO12D
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Diabetes

variable.name: MFO12E
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Asthma

variable.name: MFO12F
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? High cholesterol

variable.name: MFO12G
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Anemia

variable.name: MFO12H
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Requiring dialysis

variable.name: MFO12I
variable.description: Since the last routine VISP visit, by telephone or in clinic, following medical problems that had not been diagnosed previously? Other new conditions

variable.name: MFO12J1
variable.description: Specify other conditions (line 1)

variable.name: MFO12J2
variable.description: Specify other conditions (line 2)

variable.name: MFO12J3
variable.description: Specify other conditions (line 3)

variable.name: MFO13
variable.description: Do you currently smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: MFO15A
variable.description: Are you currently using: Pipes/cigars/cigarillos

variable.name: MFO15B
variable.description: Are you currently using: Chewing tobacco

variable.name: MFO15C
variable.description: Are you currently using: Snuff

variable.name: MFO15D
variable.description: Are you currently using: Nicotine gum or patch

variable.name: MFO16
variable.description: Are you currently on a special diet?

variable.name: MFO17
variable.description: Was this diet prescribed by a doctor?

variable.name: MFO18
variable.description: Please specify type of diet

variable.name: MFO19
variable.description: (If the person is a male, answer "M" and go to Item 20 without reading aloud the following question) Are you currently taking estrogen or progestins?

variable.name: MFO20
variable.description: Is this a clinic examination or a telephone interview?

variable.name: MFO26
variable.description: Cervical bruits

variable.name: MFO27
variable.description: Code number of person performing the exam

variable.name: MFO34
variable.description: Code number of person conducting the interview

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: MFO14
variable.description: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?

variable.name: MFO21
variable.description: Height

variable.name: MFO22
variable.description: Weight (pounds)

variable.name: MFO23
variable.description: Resting heart rate (beats per minute)

variable.name: MFO24A
variable.description: First sitting blood pressure measurement - systolic (mmHg)

variable.name: MFO24B
variable.description: First sitting blood pressure measurement - diastolic (mmHg)

variable.name: MFO25A
variable.description: Second sitting blood pressure measurement - systolic (mmHg)

variable.name: MFO25B
variable.description: Second sitting blood pressure measurement - diastolic (mmHg)

variable.name: MFO28
variable.description: Total cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: MFO29
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: MFO30
variable.description: Triglyceride (mg/dl)

variable.name: MFO31
variable.description: LDL cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: MFO27A
variable.description: Is this a 12-month or 24-month follow-up visit?

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: MFO5FUT
variable.description: Date of surgery

variable.name: MFO9FUT
variable.description: Date of endarterectomy

variable.name: MFO32FUT
variable.description: Date of lipid profile

variable.name: MFO33FUT
variable.description: Date of interview

variable.name: MFO3BFUT
variable.description: Date of heart attack (if more than one, record date of first attack)

variable.name: MFO7AFUT
variable.description: Date of angioplasty and/or stent

variable.name: mfo3il
variable.description: Specify other heart disease line 1
variable.comment: Appears to be a repeat of MFO3I1

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
